rows.label: bf11460100_0010
rows.name:
Passing your weapons back and forth...
that was an interesting fighting style.

rows.label: bf11460100_0020
rows.name:
It's still a work in progress.
The power of my arts isn't there yet.

rows.label: bf11460100_0030
rows.name: It'll take some time to get it right.

rows.label: bf11460100_0040
rows.name:
No, I wasn't talking about your
technique or your strength.

rows.label: bf11460100_0050
rows.name: Oh? You weren't?

rows.label: bf11460100_0060
rows.name: he connection between a human and a Blade...

rows.label: bf11460100_0070
rows.name:
A bond, perhaps?
I became interested in that.

rows.label: bf11460100_0080
rows.name: Our...

rows.label: bf11460100_0085
rows.name: bond?

rows.label: bf11460100_0090
rows.name:
It just felt like...
that's how we're supposed to be.

rows.label: bf11460100_0100
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: bf11460100_0105
rows.name: Laura-sama is alway with Shin

rows.label: bf11460100_0110
rows.name:
She only teams up with me every once in a while.
Isn't that awful?

rows.label: bf11460100_0120
rows.name: That's not true! I treat you both equally.

rows.label: bf11460100_0130
rows.name: No way...

rows.label: bf11460100_0140
rows.name:
You're both my precious partners.
I don't play favorites.

rows.label: bf11460100_0150
rows.name: Are you suuure?

rows.label: bf11460100_0160
rows.name:
Kasumi's just jealous because
I've been bonded with you longer.

rows.label: bf11460100_0170
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: bf11460100_0180
rows.name: Okay, I've got it.

rows.label: bf11460100_0190
rows.name:
Starting tomorrow,
Kasumi takes the lead. How's that?

rows.label: bf11460100_0200
rows.name: Yay!

rows.label: bf11460100_0210
rows.name: That's okay, right?

rows.label: bf11460100_0220
rows.name: It's fine with me.
